body: I'm having problems connecting and staying on Avicus. Anyone know whats going on, or having the same problem?
body_tagged: I'm having problems connecting and staying on Avicus. Anyone know whats going on, or having the same problem?
title: Problems

replies.body: I cant play, like at all... I join in start up a round, and boom Timed Out.. Now my forums are having some issues as well. Player profile pictures dont show up...
replies.body_tagged: I cant play, like at all... I join in start up a round, and boom Timed Out.. Now my forums are having some issues as well. Player profile pictures dont show up...

replies.body: I hope the server/forum host isn't crashing AGAIN :/
replies.body_tagged: I hope the server/forum host isn't crashing AGAIN :/

replies.body: You already made a thread, about this. Btw. You can edit the title and the thread it self + bumping your own thread is allowed.

replies.body:
Most likely Ivy had to renew the avic.us domain name since Minecraft "Couldn't resolve hostname", even though 198.27.103.7 was still functional.

Just a theory.
